sentence: Rep. Peter Meijer (R-Mich.) Fiona Hill Barton Gellman.
title: POLITICO Playbook: Welcome to 2022

sentence: Both inherited family fortunes, to which few can relate: RINO Fred Upton is an heir to the Whirlpool washing machine fortune, while his fellow pro-impeachment Republican Peter Meijer benefits from his ancestors' supermarket chain wealth.
author: Andy Schlafly
title: Trumpify the GOP  defeat all RINOs!
